products.title: Roma, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: This roma is natural by name, and natural by nature. This creamy off-white shade will allow plenty of light to penetrate through into the room, while still offering plenty of privacy when needed, meaning that you could have this blind closed all the time if need be. An excellent choice for rooms needing both privacy and light, such as a bathroom or bedroom, this shade will match pretty much any colour scheme.

products.title: Roma, Natural - Vertical Blind
products.description: The roma in natural is just a whisper of a cream, with a finely woven fabric and a gentle, natural hue. An effective filter blind, this is the model of class, style, and neutrality. The natural will work as part of almost any colour scheme, being particularly suited to clean, fresh rooms full of soft pastels, such as pinks or blues - the perfect colour scheme for a nursery or child's bedroom. Or hang it in the living room amongst country greens and fresh, dainty florals, for a charmingly rustic feel with a contemporary twist.

products.title: Wood Effect, Natural - Venetian Blind
products.description: The natural is the lightest of their wood effect range, and will match almost any colour scheme. It combines a classically light wood effect with the sturdy toughness of heavy gauge aluminium, resulting in a modern and stylish look. The unobtrusive wood-look of the natural will match almost any colour palette. Use amongst pastels in a light and airy dining room; with forest greens in a statement dining room; or with fuchsia pinks in a teenager's bedroom.

products.title: Faux Silk, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: In the palest of apricot golds, the faux silk in natural sits on a pretty and delicate fabric, scattered with lines of raised stitching to add texture and depth. The slight and dainty cloth works easily into the sumptuous roman curves, outlaying soft and cloud-like feel. Convert a plain bedroom into a utopia of dreamy elegance by alloying the natural to a scheme of golds and pinks. Choose pale pink walls, in either a plain paint or a floral wallpaper, and accent throughout the room with shimmering pale gold accessories, choosing cream or light wood furniture.

products.title: Innocence, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: A soft, neutral blind, patterned with simply drawn, off-white ferns, the innocence in natural is quiet and unassuming. The gently light-filtering material allows just the right amount of light through, whilst still offering all of the privacy you need. Cream-coloured kitchens with a light and airy feel will benefit from the natural, which will hang discreetly amongst both stronger colours and other neutrals, making it the ideal shade for those who prefer hushed, low-key hues without any risk of colour-clashing.

products.title: Linara Spc, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: In a sumptuous, eye-soothing blend of shimmering white and cool cream, the linara in natural adds timeless elegance to any home. Its dimout function restricts bright light, bathing the room in a softened glow. This truly beautiful cream colour provides the perfect accompaniment for mid-neutral colour palettes in a living room, or even serves to tone down more vibrant greens, purples, and terracotta shades.

products.title: Luster, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: Luster natural is one of those fabrics that seem to have been around forever, and yet you've never seen it before. It's this timeless look and feel that really helps take your decor to a new and exciting place, and it's something you'll fall in love with the moment it lands on your doorstep. Combining natural with other simple yet striking shades is the name of the game here. Pairing it with some charcoal, oak, and a little bit of sandy beige would be a great way to make a start on breathing life into the living room.

products.title: Osborne, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: The osborne in natural adds a look of luxury and taste, without feeling lavish or over-the-top. The soft taupe patterning on a bed of light-filtering cream work together to bring together contemporary traditionalism and pretty comfort. The natural will sit comfortably in a number of colour schemes, the most notable being one of turquoises, aquas, and golds, which will suit a modern bedroom or living room in need of a refreshing dcor revival.

products.title: Neo, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for something natural, yet not plain, the neo natural might just be the blind for you. This light-filtering blind combines a subtle beige background with off-white patterning, perfect for adding character without intruding on existing dcor. Craft a calming home office space that will help you concentrate and relax while you work, by combining the natural with other soft neutrals and creams.

products.title: Woodland, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: Woodland natural combines a simple and neutral on-trend colour with a unique texture to give an added layer of unexpected depth to your decor. It's these little touches that bring the fabric to life, and make you feel at home as soon as you put your key in the door. If you want to be able to turn on the style in the dining room, why not treat yourself to some slate flooring and a matching thick wooden topped table? These are the sort of rustic meets contemporary touches that woodland natural was made to hang by.

products.title: Saphira, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: As you stand back and admire saphira natural, you come to appreciate the elegant way in which the colours have combined to create something that is very much greater than the sum of their parts. The clever use of calming greens and soothing blues really does give the fabric a life of its own. We love the idea of working in a powdery sunrise orange so that that you can turn the master bedroom into the space that greets you with a smile when you wake each morning.

products.title: Glencoe, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: The glencoe natural features an antique ivory base as home to delicately drawn stags in a deep brown-toned grey. The effect is one of elegant simplicity with a distinctly country twist, making it an ideal choice for animal lovers and country lovers alike. Give the natural a home in your living room, surrounded by natural shades of brown, grey, and cream, occasionally offset with burnt oranges and forest greens.

products.title: Dotty, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: Include the amusing dotty natural print in a neutrally shaded scheme for a touch a fun and personality. This relaxed nimble cloth adds a casual yet refined look, whilst the joyful polka dot pattern is sure to add a delicate dash of charm. Add a touch of personality to a cream-based room with appealing prints, combining with taupe, mocha, and perhaps a deeper chocolate shade to add cosiness and contrast.

products.title: Faux Suede, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: A neutral combination of soft oatmeal and gentle, suede-feel fabric, the faux suede in natural is stylish and unobtrusive, perfect for offsetting against stronger shades to temper the mood in any home. The light, neutral tone of the natural makes it a versatile and easy to mix into a range of decor schemes. It would be ideal for giving a darker room a lightening effect or for adding additional texture to a room full of different kinds of fabrics.

products.title: Hartley, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: If you're hoping to combine cutesy kitsch with woodland rusticity, then the hartley natural would suit you and your home down to the ground. Sweet rabbit illustrations sit neatly on a pale biscuit background, added to by cute miniature polka dots in soft cream, making for an adorable window covering for any room. Hang this country-style roman blind in a neutrally toned guest bedroom, surrounding it with plenty of natural woods, beige and brown tones, and perhaps some forest greens thrown in for a touch of colour.

products.title: Pheasant, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: A traditionally country blind, the pheasant natural displays classic drawings of colourful pheasants, male and female, amidst neutrally toned grasses, all placed beautifully on a peppered oatmeal background. Hang the natural in a rural kitchen, amidst plenty of natural woods, slates, and ceramics. Keep the colour scheme open and neutral, adding in forest green and burnt orange tones to bring out the hues of the blind.

products.title: Mallard, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: For some classic country charm, look no further than the mallard natural. A pretty oatmeal background hosts beautifully painted ducks in charming shades of brown and green, accentuated by a pattern of white spots to finish the piece. Give your kitchen some farmyard appeal by hanging this country-style blind amidst plenty of natural woods, neutrally toned walls and units, and classic country shades of green and cream.

products.title: Magnum, Natural - Day Night Blind
products.description: Creamy oatmeal forms the basis for the magnum in natural, and its double-layered fabric is home to the range's signature translucent strips, which can be raised or lowered as more or less light and privacy is required. Versatile in more way than one, the natural can be used in almost any colour scheme. Why not use it in the dining room amidst a rich sky blue for a natural look that brings the outdoors in? Opt for light woods to match the blind, and include plenty of blues and whites for light and character.

products.title: Fiji, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: Produce an elegant and stylish look with the fiji in natural in a beguiling golden shade, where silky thread meets voile-like fabric for a distinctive appearance and added charisma. This delicate fusion produces a sophisticated blind with subtle texture for a touch of tasteful character. Combine the natural with ivories, golds, and honeyed tones for a sleek aesthetic, adding comforting, sumptuous linens and sheer fabrics for a refined edge.

products.title: Acacia, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: For a distinct dcor scheme with lavish fabric and dazzling colour, include the splendid acacia in natural, with its plush embellishment and quilted texture, and where a charming foliage display is formed from opulent gold and emerald threads. The sophisticated cream background provides refined style and elegance. Combine the natural with an assortment of layered fabrics and luxuriously embellished details for a welcoming and affluent look.

products.title: Tweety, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: In sweet and cheery shades of sunny orange, lemon yellow, cool aqua, and many more, the tweety natural is a prettily formed roman blind with as much character as colour. Adorable birds sit atop neutrally toned branches, giving a contemporary yet natural look. Use the natural as a key design element in a cutely kitsch kitchen, surrounding it with natural woods and creamy units. Use your favourite colours from the fabric to decide on accenting colours to be carried across by utensils, accessories, and the like.

products.title: Castelli, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: The castelli natural is a beautiful shade of golden cream, with a luxurious chenille-like texture bringing depth of colour and character to the fabric. The various stitching types make this more than a flat fabric blind, offering a feeling of luxe class you'll find irresistible. Add the natural to any room in need of a touch of lush comfort, and surround it with contrasting rich tones, such as plum or chocolate, perhaps as part of a feature wall.

products.title: Abstract, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: Abstract is as abstract does, and in natural, it just lives and breathes beautiful, ethereal patterning. Almost navy mixes with muted mustard yellow, giving life to creamy greys and washed out maroons. The outcome? A softly pretty roman blind full of character. Hang the natural in the hallway or landing to add just a hint of colour to an often neglected area of the home. Surround with neutral walls, but accent with similar blues or reds in the form of wall art and ornaments.

products.title: Kasian, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: A neutral mixture of soft white, hushed taupe, and creamy oatmeal, the kasian natural showcases a contemporary abstract pattern that's sure to fit in anywhere. The attractive fabric, complemented by high quality fixtures, looks like it was made for those soft roman folds. Allow the natural to temper a room filled with deep chocolate tones, perhaps even against a brown feature wall, where it will offset the tones perfectly.

products.title: Kershaw, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: Soft neutrals and contemporary florals meld together in the kershaw natural, a beautifully styled roman blind with a timeless sense of sophisticated and an understated air that will offset most colour schemes. Bring a tempered patterning to a bright or bold feature wall in your living room, where the natural will sit pretty against a deep chocolate brown or rich red shade. Add plush fabrics to the rest of the room for a cosy feel that you'll want to sit back and relax in.

products.title: Aretha, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: A beautiful take on a paisley pattern, the aretha range just screams sophistication. The natural mixes a light aqua turquoise with varying shades of chocolate, coffee, and oatmeal, interspersed with burnt orange accents. Use the natural to give your living room a rather grand look, setting it against golden oatmeal walls and opting for plenty of wooden furniture, and perhaps even wooden flooring too.

products.title: Fuji, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: The fuji in natural takes tropically themed imagery and applies a neutral tone to it, resulting in a prettily understated patterning that offers a moody elegance with plenty of toning to it. The blind will work beautifully in a contemporary setting. Blend the natural amidst other neutral shades of biscuit and brown in a den or guest bedroom. Keep the walls light, in a soft shade of cream, and add a hint of teal, turquoise, or aqua for extra interest and depth.

products.title: Capri, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: With its pale and creamy biscuit base, adorned with grey, mint, and apple-toned florals, the capri in natural is true to its name. The abundance of green tones in this blind sit prettily on amongst the lush cream, grey, and white tones, making this a beautifully understated piece. Hang the natural in a light and airy living room or dining room, and stick to its colour scheme by surrounding it with plenty of pale, serene shades of white and cream, accenting with muted sages and the occasional forest green.

products.title: Morrison, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: In the morrison natural, a current and embellished design in silver-hued dove, slate, and charcoal greys, sits on a softer dusty background. The linen-look cloth with its silky thread hangs neatly into the flowing shape of the roman, giving a classical edge to this modern blind. Combine the contemporary pattern of the natural with similar arty fabrics and elegant stitchings to form a traditional style and, by continuing the stormy grey and charcoal hues in similarly toned fabrics, form a modish finish with soothing shades.

products.title: Burdock, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: The burdock natural displays an earthy green canvas covered in fluffy white burdock flowers. Accenting colours include light aqua, deep lilac, and charcoal black, and the overall effect is moodily natural. Team the natural with a nature-inspired theme, where it will fit in perfectly. Include creamy whites, pale lilacs, and sweet aquas to lighten to look, and go for natural woods and perhaps some slate or other natural stones.

products.title: Buckingham, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: Add character and depth to your dcor by including the buckingham in natural, where layers of splendid fabric and silky thread gather to form a textured blind with a delicate floral embroidery. Created from shades of ivory and taupe with golden hues, it offers a glamorous finish. Form an elegant and lavish style in a magnolia-based living room by combining the natural with similarly textured materials and distinctive furnishings, accenting the golden stitch by adding gilded accessories and layers of sheer fabric.

products.title: Highland, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: The ultimate in country neutrals, the highland in natural blends rich, creamy biscuit and camel shades for a gorgeously toned effect. This luxe roman blind is ideal for a rural home and will really bring out your love of the country. Surround the natural with similar cream and beige tones, as well as some deeper barky browns and grass and forest greens. Add the occasional print of an animal sketch, such as stags and rabbits, and you have the perfect cosy living room or master bedroom look.

products.title: Roller, 4000 Natural - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.
